mapper.select: SELECT class_id, category_id, class_title, class_startdate, class_enddate FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(to_date('21/08/01', 'YY-MM-DD'), 'MONTH') month, TRUNC(to_date('21/08/01', 'YY-MM-DD'),'MM') month_first, LAST_DAY(to_date('21/08/01', 'YY-MM-DD')) month_last FROM dual ) cri, ( SELECT endd.class_title, endd.category_id, startd.*, endd.class_enddate FROM ( SELECT class_id, class_startdate FROM iclass WHERE class_id IN (select class_id from buy where user_id = #{userId} and buy_id IN (select buy_id from pay where pay_state='pay')) and class_enddate >= sysdate ) startd, ( SELECT class_title, category_id, class_id, class_enddate FROM iclass WHERE class_id IN (select class_id from buy where user_id = #{userId} and buy_id IN (select buy_id from pay where pay_state='pay')) and class_enddate >= sysdate ) endd WHERE startd.class_id = endd.class_id ) WHERE (month_first <= class_startdate and month_last >= class_startdate) or (month_first <= class_enddate and month_last >= class_enddate) ORDER BY category_id asc
